document.full_text: procter & gamble's sale of pringles, which began as such a dud that some called for the company to dump the brand, concludes a sometimes zany 50-year experiment in engineered food.
document.title: once a great flop, now sold for billions
lines_and_colors: procter & gamble's sale of pringles, which began as such a dud that some called for the company to dump the brand, concludes a sometimes zany 50-year experiment in engineered food.
